CustomField.formula: CASE( Clearly_prep_the_meeting__c , "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Set_and_follow_proper_agenda__c , "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Provided_accurate_guidance_suggestions__c , "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Provide_proper_expectations_answers__c, "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Speak_clearly_without_unnecessary_filler__c, "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Keep_tone_and_pace_of_call_appropriate__c, "NA", 2, 0)+ CASE( Recap_with_action_items_due_dates__c, "NA", 2, 0)
CustomField.label: NA Count Short
